roleset.name: give advantage to

example.text: Selling such assets had an overriding public benefit .
example.note: 'Overriding' is PRD as it is considered a verb in treebank.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The benefit to consumers from the use of informative credit reports is demonstrated by showing the improvement in credit decisions.
example.arg: from the use of informative credit reports

roleset.note: Based on verb entry benefit.01. No corresponding entry in VN.
